==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=四县}}

===Etymology===
Refers to four counties of the Jiaying Prefecture during the Qing dynasty: Xingning ({{zh-l|興寧*}}), Changle ({{zh-l|長樂*}}, now called Wuhua {{zh-l|五華*}}), Pingyuan ({{zh-l|平遠*}}) and Zhenping ({{zh-l|鎮平*}}, now called Jiaoling {{zh-l|蕉嶺*}}). Taiwanese Hakkas who speak the Sixian dialect can generally trace back their ancestry to these counties.
